sqlMap.select: select ID as id, C_NAME as name, C_ENNAME as enname, C_STAR as star, C_HOT as hot, C_REPAIR as repair, C_CONTRYID as contryid, C_PROVINCEID as provinceid, C_CITYID as cityid, C_REGIONID1 as regionid1, C_REGIONID2 as regionid2, C_REGIONID3 as regionid3, C_ADDRESS as address, C_DESCRIPTION as description, C_TYPE as type, C_ROOMS as rooms, C_FOOTITEM as footitem, C_SERVICEITEM as serviceitem, C_MEETINGITEM as meetingitem, C_PLAYITEM as playitem, C_CARTTYPE as carttype, C_REPAILDATE as repaildate, C_NEARHOTEL as nearhotel, C_POSTCODE as postcode, C_STATE as state, C_PYNAME as pyname, C_JPNAME as jpname, C_MAINFLOOR as mainfloor, C_WEBSIGN as websign, C_OPENDATE as opendate, C_FAXDESC as faxdesc, C_MARKETTELL as markettell, C_TORTELL as tortell, C_PRESPEC as prespec, C_APPENDLEVER as appendlever, C_MAINLEVEL as mainlevel, C_STATEDESC as statedesc, C_SELLPOINT as sellpoint, C_FULLNAME as fullname, C_OPENBANK as openbank, C_BANKACCOUNT as bankaccount, C_SORT as sort, C_COMPANYID as companyid, C_CHECKDESC as checkdesc, C_FAX2 as fax2, C_FAX1 as fax1, C_STARTPRICE as startprice, C_LNG as lng, C_LAT as lat, C_UCODE as ucode, C_LANGUAGE as language, C_COUNTRYID as countryid, C_SOURCETYPE as sourcetype, C_HOTELCODE as hotelcode, C_AIRPORTSERVICE as airportservice, C_TRAFFICINFO as trafficinfo, C_PAYTYPE as paytype, C_CHECKTYPE as checktype, C_REBATEWAY as rebateway, C_RULESBACK as rulesback, C_PAYMENT as payment, C_CHAININFOID as chaininfoid, C_PRICETYPE as pricetype, C_MENEYBACK as meneyback from T_HOTEL where ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into T_HOTEL ( ID, C_NAME, C_ENNAME, C_STAR, C_HOT, C_REPAIR, C_CONTRYID, C_PROVINCEID, C_CITYID, C_REGIONID1, C_REGIONID2, C_REGIONID3, C_ADDRESS, C_DESCRIPTION, C_TYPE, C_ROOMS, C_FOOTITEM, C_SERVICEITEM, C_MEETINGITEM, C_PLAYITEM, C_CARTTYPE, C_REPAILDATE, C_NEARHOTEL, C_POSTCODE, C_STATE, C_PYNAME, C_JPNAME, C_MAINFLOOR, C_WEBSIGN, C_OPENDATE, C_FAXDESC, C_MARKETTELL, C_TORTELL, C_PRESPEC, C_APPENDLEVER, C_MAINLEVEL, C_STATEDESC, C_SELLPOINT, C_FULLNAME, C_OPENBANK, C_BANKACCOUNT, C_SORT, C_COMPANYID, C_CHECKDESC, C_FAX2, C_FAX1, C_STARTPRICE, C_LNG, C_LAT, C_UCODE, C_LANGUAGE, C_COUNTRYID, C_SOURCETYPE, C_HOTELCODE, C_AIRPORTSERVICE, C_TRAFFICINFO, C_PAYTYPE, C_CHECKTYPE, C_REBATEWAY, C_RULESBACK, C_PAYMENT, C_CHAININFOID, C_PRICETYPE, C_MENEYBACK ) values (

update T_HOTEL set C_NAME = #name#, C_ENNAME = #enname#, C_STAR = #star:DECIMAL#, C_HOT = #hot:DECIMAL#, C_REPAIR = #repair:DECIMAL#, C_CONTRYID = #contryid:DECIMAL#, C_PROVINCEID = #provinceid:DECIMAL#, C_CITYID = #cityid:DECIMAL#, C_REGIONID1 = #regionid1:DECIMAL#, C_REGIONID2 = #regionid2:DECIMAL#, C_REGIONID3 = #regionid3:DECIMAL#, C_ADDRESS = #address#, C_DESCRIPTION = #description#, C_TYPE = #type:DECIMAL#, C_ROOMS = #rooms:DECIMAL#, C_FOOTITEM = #footitem#, C_SERVICEITEM = #serviceitem#, C_MEETINGITEM = #meetingitem#, C_PLAYITEM = #playitem#, C_CARTTYPE = #carttype#, C_REPAILDATE = #repaildate#, C_NEARHOTEL = #nearhotel#, C_POSTCODE = #postcode#, C_STATE = #state:DECIMAL#, C_PYNAME = #pyname#, C_JPNAME = #jpname#, C_MAINFLOOR = #mainfloor#, C_WEBSIGN = #websign:DECIMAL#, C_OPENDATE = #opendate#, C_FAXDESC = #faxdesc#, C_MARKETTELL = #markettell#, C_TORTELL = #tortell#, C_PRESPEC = #prespec#, C_APPENDLEVER = #appendlever:DECIMAL#, C_MAINLEVEL = #mainlevel:DECIMAL#, C_STATEDESC = #statedesc#, C_SELLPOINT = #sellpoint#, C_FULLNAME = #fullname#, C_OPENBANK = #openbank#, C_BANKACCOUNT = #bankaccount#, C_SORT = #sort:DECIMAL#, C_COMPANYID = #companyid:DECIMAL#, C_CHECKDESC = #checkdesc#, C_FAX2 = #fax2#, C_FAX1 = #fax1#, C_STARTPRICE = #startprice:DECIMAL#, C_LNG = #lng:DECIMAL#, C_LAT = #lat:DECIMAL#, C_UCODE = #ucode:DECIMAL#, C_LANGUAGE = #language:DECIMAL#, C_COUNTRYID = #countryid:DECIMAL#, C_SOURCETYPE = #sourcetype:DECIMAL#, C_HOTELCODE = #hotelcode#, C_AIRPORTSERVICE = #airportservice#, C_TRAFFICINFO = #trafficinfo#, C_PAYTYPE = #paytype:DECIMAL#, C_CHECKTYPE = #checktype:DECIMAL#, C_REBATEWAY = #rebateway:DECIMAL#, C_RULESBACK = #rulesback#, C_PAYMENT = #payment:DECIMAL#, C_CHAININFOID = #chaininfoid:DECIMAL#, C_PRICETYPE = #pricetype:DECIMAL#, C_MENEYBACK = #meneyback:DECIMAL#
